| An oceanid:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                                                                                      |

**Oceanids** are a special type of [shopkeeper](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper") found in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack").

## Generation

They appear only in the [Mithardir chaos quest](/wiki/Mithardir_Quest "Mithardir Quest"), and sell [towels](/wiki/Towel "Towel"), weak clothing, and nymph equipment.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Oceanid\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Oceanid

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
n oceanid (No tile)
Difficulty 20
Attacks Weapon 1d1 physical, Claw 0d0 seduction, Claw 0d0 seduction, Passive 0d0 rust
n oceanid (No tile)
Difficulty 20
Attacks

Weapon 1d1 physical, Claw 0d0 seduction, Claw 0d0 seduction, Passive 0d0 rust

Base level 15
Base experience 441
Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 50
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances cold, sleep, poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed cold

An oceanid:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • cannot be tamed.

Oceanids are a special type of shopkeeper found in dNetHack.

Generation

They appear only in the Mithardir chaos quest, and sell towels, weak clothing, and nymph equipment.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Oceanid&oldid=140924"

'''Oceanids''' are a special type of [[shopkeeper]] found in [[dNetHack]].

==Generation==
They appear only in the [[Mithardir Quest|Mithardir chaos quest]], and sell [[towel]]s, weak clothing, and nymph equipment.
